trans-unit.source: abgleich is a simple ZFS sync tool. It displays source and target ZFS zpool, dataset and snapshot trees. It creates meaningful snapshots only if datasets have actually been changed. It compares a source zpool tree to a target, backup zpool tree. It pushes backups from a source to a target. It cleanes up older snapshots on the source side if they are present on the target side. It runs on a command line and produces nice, user-friendly, human-readable, colorized output. It also includes a GUI.
trans-unit.target: abgleich 是一个简单的ZFS同步工具。它显示源和目标ZFS zpool，数据集和快照树。仅当数据集实际上已更改时，它才会创建有意义的快照。它将源zpool树与目标备用zpool树进行比较。它将备份从源推送到目标。如果目标端存在旧快照，它将在源端清除旧快照。它在命令行上运行，并产生漂亮的，用户友好的，人类可读的，彩色的输出。它还包括一个GUI。

trans-unit.source: abgleich uses Python's type hints and enforces them with typeguard at runtime. It furthermore makes countless assertions.
trans-unit.target: abgleich 使用Python的类型提示，并在运行时使用typeguard实施它们。此外，它做出了无数断言。

trans-unit.source: abgleich, CPython and the Unix shell must only be installed on one of the involved systems. Any remote system will be contacted via ssh and provided with direct ZFS commands.
trans-unit.target: abgleich ，CPython和Unix shell只能安装在所涉及的系统之一上。任何远程系统都将通过ssh与之联系，并提供直接的ZFS命令。

trans-unit.source: ABGLEICH
trans-unit.target: ABGLEICH

trans-unit.source: All actions involving a remote host assume that ssh with public key authentication instead of passwords is correctly configured and working.
trans-unit.target: 涉及远程主机的所有操作均假定正确配置了带有公共密钥身份验证而不是密码的 ssh 并可以正常工作。

trans-unit.source: All potentially changing or destructive actions are listed in detail before the user is asked to confirm them. None of the commands listed below create, change or destroy a zpool, dataset or snapshot on their own without the user's explicit consent.
trans-unit.target: 在要求用户确认之前,所有潜在的更改或破坏性操作都会详细列出。以下所列的命令都不会在未经用户明确同意的情况下自行创建、更改或销毁zpool、数据集或快照。

trans-unit.source: An installation also including a GUI can be triggered by running:
trans-unit.target: 包括GUI的安装可以通过运行来触发。

trans-unit.source: CLI EXAMPLE
trans-unit.target: CLI示例

trans-unit.source: Cleanup older local snapshots on source side if they are present on both sides. Of those snapshots present on both sides, keep at least keep_snapshots number of snapshots on source side.
trans-unit.target: 如果在源端和旧端都存在旧快照，则在源端清除它们。在两侧都存在的快照中，至少在源侧保留 keep_snapshots 个快照。

trans-unit.source: Compare source ZFS tree with target ZFS tree. See what is missing where.
trans-unit.target: 比较源ZFS树和目标ZFS树。看看哪里缺少了什么。

trans-unit.source: Complete example configuration file:
trans-unit.target: 完整的配置文件示例。

trans-unit.source: Determine which datasets on the source side have been changed since last snapshot. Generate snapshots on the source side where applicable.
trans-unit.target: 确定自上次快照以来,源侧的哪些数据集已被更改。在适用的情况下,在源端生成快照。

trans-unit.target: GUI示例

trans-unit.source: INITIALIZATION
trans-unit.target: 初始化

trans-unit.source: INSTALLATION
trans-unit.target: 安装

trans-unit.source: Let's assume that everything in source_tank/data and below should be synced with target_tank/some_backup/data. source_tank and target_tank are zpools. data is the "prefix" for the source zpool, some_backup/data is the corresponding "prefix" for the target zpool. For abgleich to work, source_tank/data and target_tank/some_backup must exist. target_tank/some_backup/data must not exist. The latter will be created by abgleich. It is highly recommended to set the mountpoint of target_tank/some_backup to none before running abgleich for the first time.
trans-unit.target: 假设 source_tank/data 及以下的所有内容都应与 target_tank/some_backup/data 同步。 source_tank 和 target_tank 是zpool。 data 是源zpool的“前缀”， some_backup/data 是目标zpool的相应“前缀”。为了使 abgleich 正常工作，必须存在 source_tank/data 和 target_tank/some_backup 。 target_tank/some_backup/data 必须不存在。后者将由 abgleich 创建。强烈建议将 target_tank/some_backup 的挂载点设置为 none 在第一次运行 abgleich 之前。

trans-unit.source: Requires CPython 3.6 or later, a Unix shell and ssh. GUI support requires Qt5 in addition. Tested with OpenZFS 0.8.x on Linux.
trans-unit.target: 需要CPython 3.6或更高版本，Unix shell和ssh。GUI支持还需要Qt5。在Linux上使用OpenZFS 0.8.x进行了测试。

trans-unit.source: Rights to run the following commands are required:
trans-unit.target: 需要有运行以下命令的权限。

trans-unit.source: Runs a sequence of snap, backup and cleanup in a wizard GUI. This command is only available if abgleich was installed with GUI support.
trans-unit.target: 在向导GUI中运行一系列的 snap ， backup 和 cleanup 。仅当 abgleich 安装了GUI支持时，此命令才可用。

trans-unit.source: SPEED
trans-unit.target: 速度

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: SYNOPSIS

trans-unit.source: Send (new) datasets and new snapshots from source to target.
trans-unit.target: 将(新的)数据集和新的快照从源发送至目标。

trans-unit.source: Show ZFS tree with snapshots, disk space and compression ratio. Append source or target (optional).
trans-unit.target: 显示具有快照，磁盘空间和压缩率的ZFS树。附加 source 或 target （可选）。

trans-unit.source: The base CLI tool can be installed as follows:
trans-unit.target: 基本的CLI工具可以按以下方式安装。

trans-unit.source: The enforcement of types and assertions can be controlled through the PYTHONOPTIMIZE environment variable. If set to 0 (the implicit default value), all checks are activated. abgleich will run slow. For safety, this mode is highly recommended. For significantly higher speed, all type checks and most assertions can be deactivated by setting PYTHONOPTIMIZE to 1 or 2, e.g. PYTHONOPTIMIZE=1 abgleich tree config.yaml. This is not recommended. You may want to check if another tool or configuration has altered this environment variable by running echo $PYTHONOPTIMIZE.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过 PYTHONOPTIMIZE 环境变量来控制类型和断言的实施。如果设置为 0 （隐式默认值），则会激活所有检查。 abgleich 将运行缓慢。为了安全起见，强烈建议使用此模式。为了显着提高速度，可以通过将 PYTHONOPTIMIZE 设置为 1 或 2 来停用所有类型检查和大多数断言，例如 PYTHONOPTIMIZE=1 abgleich tree config.yaml 。不建议这样做。您可能想通过运行 echo $PYTHONOPTIMIZE 检查其他工具或配置是否已更改此环境变量。

trans-unit.source: The prefix can be empty on either side. If a host is set to localhost, the user field can be left empty. Both source and target can be remote hosts or localhost at the same time. include_root indicates whether {zpool}{/{prefix}} should be included in all operations. keep_snapshots is an integer and must be greater or equal to 1. It specifies the number of snapshots that are kept per dataset on the source side when a cleanup operation is triggered. suffix contains the name suffix for new snapshots. Setting always_changed to yes causes abgleich to beliefe that all datasets have always changed since the last snapshot, completely ignoring what ZFS actually reports. No diff will be produced & checked for values of written lower than written_threshold. Checking diffs can be completely deactivated by setting check_diff to no. digits specifies how many digits are used for a decimal number describing the n-th snapshot per dataset per day as part of the name of new snapshots. ignore lists stuff underneath the prefix which will be ignored by this tool, i.e. no snapshots, backups or cleanups. ssh allows to fine-tune the speed of backups. In fast local networks, it is best to set compression to no because the compression is usually slowing down the transfer. However, for low-bandwidth transmissions, it makes sense to set it to yes. For significantly better speed in fast local networks, make sure that both the source and the target system support a common cipher, which is accelerated by AES-NI on both ends.
trans-unit.target: 前缀的任何一侧都可以为空。如果 host 设置为 localhost ，则 user 字段可以保留为空。源和目标都可以同时是远程主机或本地主机。 include_root 指示是否应在所有操作中包括 {zpool}{/{prefix}} 。 keep_snapshots 是一个整数，必须大于或等于 1 。它指定触发清除操作时在源侧每个数据集保留的快照数。 suffix 包含新快照的名称后缀。将 always_changed 设置为 yes 会导致 abgleich 相信自上次快照以来所有数据集都一直在更改，完全忽略了ZFS实际报告的内容。不会产生差异，也不会检查是否 written 值小于 written_threshold 。可以通过将 check_diff 设置为 no 来完全停用检查差异。 digits 指定十进制数使用多少位数，该数字描述每天每个数据集的第n个快照，作为新快照名称的一部分。 ignore 会在此工具将忽略的 prefix 下面列出东西，即没有快照，备份或清理。 ssh 可以微调备份速度。在快速的本地网络中，最好进行设置 compression 到 no 因为压缩通常会减慢传输速度。但是，对于低带宽传输，将其设置为 yes 是有意义的。为了在快速的本地网络中显着提高速度，请确保源系统和目标系统都支持一个通用密码，该密码由两端的AES-NI加速。
